name: Lloyd Price
description: '''Lloyd Price''' (March 9, 1933{{spnd}}May 3, 2021) was an American R&B and rock 'n' roll singer, known as "Mr. Personality", after his 1959 million-selling hit, "[[Personality (Lloyd Price song)|Personality]]". His first recording, "[[Lawdy Miss Clawdy]]", was a hit for [[Specialty Records]] in 1952. He continued to release [[gramophone record|records]], but none were as popular until several years later, when he refined the New Orleans beat and achieved a series of national hits. He was inducted into the [[Rock and Roll Hall of Fame]] in 1998.
